author: Lon.TV
description:
Find a low cost Mac at B&H : https://lon.tv/qvtrh (compensated affiliate link) - UTM is a free, open source virtualization and emulation application for the Mac. It can run the ARM versions of Windows 11 and Linux as well as emulate OS's designed for other processors. See more App Gems: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnItwUd17GYPSXE_BW-5P579J and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

UTM: https://mac.getutm.app/
Windows 95 Image: https://archive.org/details/windows-95-for-utm

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
02:05 - Where to get UTM
02:41 - UTM in action
03:37 - Not recommended for gaming
04:18 - Linux
05:14 - How to get started
05:57 - Quick Start from the Gallery
06:46 - Windows 11 How To
14:18 - USB, CD-ROM and Shared Folder options
16:59 - Installing Ubuntu ARM from Gallery
17:51 - Retro OS: Windows 95
20:25 - Booting Classic Mac
21:28 - Recommendations for Legacy Windows apps
21:39 - QEMU Emulation Settings

Visit my Blog! https://blog.lon.tv

Subscribe to my email lists! 
Week
title: Free App Gem: UTM For Mac Runs Windows, Linux and More !
